definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Objective To improve the performance level and awareness of CT imaging with brain abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对脑脓肿CT影像学表现的认识和诊断水平。

sentences.english: This color composite view was recorded under dark skies near Sydney, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这张彩色合成影像是在澳洲的雪梨附近所拍摄。

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光时使用不同滤色镜即可获得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: Eva's wedding album holds only a faint glimmer of the wedding itself.
sentences.chinese: 埃娃的结婚相册仅仅保存了婚礼本身暗弱的影像。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉畸形骨肥大综合征影像诊断的征象。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the accuracy of imaging diagnosis of intrathoracic tumor-simulating extramedullary hematopoiesis(EMH).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对胸内瘤样髓外造血组织影像诊断的准确性。

sentences.english: In this paper, the status and development of vehicle-mounted medical imaging equipments at home and broad were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了国内外车载医学影像装备的发展现状。

sentences.english: Sokurov, Death Concern, Cultural Metaphor, the Images of Mentalizing.
sentences.chinese: 索科洛夫，死亡关注，文化隐喻，心理化影像。

sentences.english: Each screened performance is a unique combination of audiovisuals.
sentences.chinese: 每一段投射的演出都有著结合声音影像的独特。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the abnormal imagine of postoperative T-tube retrograde cholangiography for clinical practive.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨术后经T形管胆道造影异常影像的临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anatomy and HRCT findings of foramen of nasal bone.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻骨孔的解剖基础及影像学表现。

sentences.english: The body position is all the same with each medical image examination.
sentences.chinese: 受检者在多种影像检查的体位一致。

sentences.english: The image is out of focus.
Satellite imagery shows that the forest extent is much less than currently shown on operational maps.
sentences.chinese: 卫星影像表明森林远比实施图上的要少。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper presents ar emote sensing system.
sentences.chinese: 最后，本文实现了一个遥感影像处理系统。

sentences.english: Methods The imaging findings and pathologic characteristics of 31 patients with EGB were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析31例EGB的影像表现及病理特征。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
